thread.title: Arsenal fan Jeremy Corbyn prepares for TV clash with Piers Morgan with some football banter
thread.title_full: Arsenal fan Jeremy Corbyn prepares for TV clash with Piers Morgan with some football banter

author: Dan Bloom
title: Arsenal fan Jeremy Corbyn prepares for TV clash with Piers Morgan with some football banter
text:
News Arsenal fan Jeremy Corbyn prepares for TV clash with Piers Morgan with some football banter The Labour leader said he would "talk some sense" into his fellow Arsenal fan about Arsene Wenger's future Share Jeremy Corbyn is looking to school Piers Morgan (Photo: Daily Mirror) Share Get politics   Thank you for subscribing! Could   
Jeremy Corbyn has been preparing for his TV clash with Piers Morgan - by bantering with him about football. 
The Labour leader said he would "talk some sense" into the Good Morning Britain host about Arsene Wenger's future. 
The unlikely pair are both Arsenal fans but are split on whether the club's manager should stay or go. Is the Queen an Arsenal fan? Gooner Jeremy Corbyn lightens up royal birthday with surprise claim 
Both men will meet tomorrow on the sofa of ITV's Good Morning Britain - an interview Morgan has clearly coveted for a while. 
"It's taken over a year but finally Jeremy Corbyn will appear live on GMB sofa tomorrow at 7.10am.," he wrote. "Exciting!" 
"Well someone has got to talk some sense into you about Wenger," Mr Corbyn replied on Twitter. 
The unusually light-hearted intervention comes after sources close to Mr Corbyn vowed to 'reboot' him as a populist anti-establishment figure. 
Mr Corbyn, who has the Emirates Stadium in his north London constituency, often jokes about his love of the beautiful game. 
House of Commons microphones caught him telling Speaker John Bercow: "We've got to beat Spurs on Saturday." 
And he joked on the Queen's 90th birthday: “We know the Queen is absolutely above politics. 
“She may be above football too but many locals harbour this quiet secret view that she’s actually privately a Gooner!" Like us on Facebook
